Package org.glassfish.contextpropagation.wireadapters.wls

Provides public interfaces and classes for compatibility with Web Logic weblogic.workarea.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ViewMeta
    This class is just a marker to help identify a View on the wire.
    WLSWireAdapter
    This WireAdapter implementation is compatible with the wire format from Web Logic Server 12.2 and earlier.

Package org.glassfish.contextpropagation.wireadapters.wls Description

Provides public interfaces and classes for compatibility with Web Logic weblogic.workarea. The preferred programming model is to use the APIs in org.glassfish.contextpropagation.

Interfaces

  • PrimitiveContext
  • PropagationMode
  • Context
  • ContextMap

Removed Interfaces

The following interfaces are not needed nor supported in BG. They have been removed.
  • ContextInput
  • ContextOutput

Classes

  • AsciiContext
  • LongContext
  • StringContext
  • SerializableContext
  • PrimitiveContextFactory

Exceptions

  • NoContextException
  • PropertyReadOnlyException
